alert.note: Alert for Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 2:31PM PST until February 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sacramento Valley including Redding. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds and snow could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is likely Monday morning and again later Monday night into Tuesday morning. Highest amounts on the west side of the northern Sacramento Valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
